MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KA5 postcode area of Mauchline. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.56am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair broken equipment on our overhead line affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:01 PM on Tuesday, 23 February 2021
